pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, January 26, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, January 26, 2017:

Regina, Saskatchewan

7:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will have breakfast with RCMP Cadets at the RCMP Academy, Depot Division.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


9:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will stop by the University of Regina to visit with students.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


Winnipeg, Manitoba

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will stop by the Robert H. Smith School to visit with students.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Duckworth Gymnasium
University of Winnipeg
400 Spence Street
Winnipeg, Manitoba

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.


3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Town Hall Q&A.

Duckworth Gymnasium
University of Winnipeg
400 Spence Street
Winnipeg, Manitoba

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.


Please note that all times are local.
